### Step by Step Guide to Learning R





 	
  1. Step 1

 	
    * Download [R](https://cran.r-project.org/).

 	
    * Download R [Studio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/).




 	
  2. Learn R Fundamentals

 	
    * [Data Camp](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/free-introduction-to-r) is a good place to start.

 	
    * [Corsera](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/jhu-data-science) also has R courses for free.

 	
    * Have experience with programming, you can start [here](http://www.cyclismo.org/tutorial/R/).




 	
  3. Make your data pretty using [ggplot2](http://courses.had.co.nz/10-tokyo/).

 	
  4. Jump into machine learning with [Kaggle](https://www.datacamp.com/community/open-courses/kaggle-r-tutorial-on-machine-learning).

 	
    * [Titanic](https://www.datacamp.com/community/open-courses/kaggle-r-tutorial-on-machine-learning) Machine Learning tutorial.

 	
    * [Must read](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwi7n7y9l83YAhVD0WMKHYs_B3IQFggpMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww-bcf.usc.edu%2F~gareth%2FISL%2F&usg=AOvVaw2SOSkWSI9kB6N2cSdz_ztG) book on Machine Learning.
